name: Orbital Bombardment
description:
Get in your low-poly spaceship, select a high-yield bombardment weapon, turn up the retro music volume and send the evil planet occupying civilization to the galaxy's dark ages!

Unlock and use different space battleships with special weapons to destroy the enemies and clear the beautiful and diverse planets from exploitation and destruction.

Enjoy the retro synthwave tracks and let the bright lights take you back to the good days!



Features:

  • 5 different spaceships with different abilities
  • Special weapons for maximum destruction
  • Unique planets
  • Retro synthwave tracks
  • Retro-space atmosphere
  • You get a complete game as in old days! No in-game transactions or DLCs.
